build.description: Changes which affect CI configuration files and scripts

chore.description: Changes which aren't user-facing and are generated automatically. e.g. audit, lint or merge commit. Do not use for manual code or test changes.

feat.description: Changes which introduce a new feature

fix.description: Use with caution! Changes which patch a bug and require a PATCH release and therefore an increase in the module version number.

refactor.description: Changes which neither fix a bug nor add a feature

revert.description: Changes which revert a previous commit

style.description: Changes which don't affect code logic, such as white-spaces, formatting, missing semi-colons

test.description: Changes which add missing tests or correct existing tests
